message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you get $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation will impact us both, but more heavily on you.  Let's finish this quickly.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  My offer in Round 1 was generous.  This is my final offer, take it or leave it before inflation hurts us both even more.
